attributes.action: the return of hanging and life sentences to mean the rest of their natural life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The return of the death penalty for all murders and when a sentance is given for life the term of the sentance to mean the rest of their natural life. When the a judgement is made for manslaughter the minimum sentance should be 10 years. Death by dangerous  driving to have a minimum sentace of 15 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
